thread.title: Taylor Swift was joined by Tove Lo on stage in Atlanta during the latest leg of her 1989 World Tour - Music
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift was joined by Tove Lo on stage in Atlanta during the latest leg of her 1989 World Tour - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Taylor Swift was joined by Tove Lo on stage in Atlanta during the latest leg of her 1989 World Tour - Music
text: It's time for your weekly dose of Taylor Swift knows more musicians than you do as the superstar has shared a video with the latest performer to join her on stage.Tove Lo has added her name to an already pretty impressive guest list after she and Tay Tay performed together during Swift's 1989 World Tour concert at the Georgia Dome in Atlanta last night (October 24)."Now if we're talkin body..."@ToveLo #1989touratlanta pic.twitter.com/AKmwgi7dlz— Taylor Swift (@taylorswift13) October 25, 2015The two performed the Swedish singer's 'Talking Body' from her debut album Queen of the Clouds.Tove Lo later took to Instagram to describe the experience of appearing with Swift as "unreal", adding that "playing for 56,000 people (!!!!) was one of the most incredible experiences of my life". UNREAL. @taylorswift I can't thank you and your fans enough for this night. Playing for 56,000 people (!!!!) was one of the most incredible experiences of my life. I will never forget this #1989worldtour #sofuckinggrateful #atlantaA photo posted by Tove Lo (@tovelo) on Oct 24, 2015 at 10:08pm PDTSwift repaid the favour on Twitter by saying that Tove Lo was an "incredible" performer on a "magical" night:Tonight was magical. @ToveLo was incredible. I you Atlanta. pic.twitter.com/pu4h7EPHmK— Taylor Swift (@taylorswift13) October 25, 2015Most recently, Swift has been joined by Ellie Goulding and Charli XCX on tour, as well as a synchronised song and dance appearance from Nelly and Haim.The 1989 World Tour guest list has so far stretched to include Mick Jagger, Lisa Kudrow, Fifth Harmony and Steven Tyler, with likely many more to come given the tour runs until December 12.Last week, Miranda Lambert also joined the ranks of Swift's celebrity guest stars by appearing at the Rupp Arena in Lexington.This is a video of @mirandalambert sitting on a throne of men at #1989TourGreensboro pic.twitter.com/unV6FvYD7q— Taylor Swift (@taylorswift13) October 22, 2015
